field.name: Version - primary asset
field.definition: indicates an asset's stage within the publishing or archival process

levelAndDeftn.levelDeftn: indicates an asset's stage within the publishing process

terms.termAndDeftn: a resource version that provides public access to resources that are not scholarly papers
a draft of a scholarly paper that has been submitted and accepted for publication and that has undergone the peer-review process, with all resulting revisions being incorporated
a draft of a scholarly paper that has not yet been peer-reviewed or published
a resource version that is for archival purposes of resources that are not scholarly papers
the official version of record, bearing all revisions resulting from the peer-review process as well as all editing and formatting done by the publisher

dos.practice: This is an optional field but use it for postprints and preprints.

donts.practice: Do not use for items that don't undergo peer review such as book covers, newsletters, non-reviewed magazine articles.
